output.dependency: The names of the beers in the first column correspond to their respective styles in the second column, indicating a semantic dependency where the type of beer is defined by its name.

The serving size in the first column is accompanied by an alcoholic content percentage in the second column, suggesting a syntactic dependency where the size affects the typical alcohol content of that beer.
The brewery name in the first column is consistently linked to the location in the second column, highlighting a semantic dependency where beers produced by the same brewery share the same location.
The city in the first column is linked to its state abbreviation in the second column, indicating a semantic dependency where each city is located in a particular state.
